name: RTATableView
summary: A highly customized and opinionated UITableView framework for RTA projects.
description:
RTATableView iA highly customized and opinionated UITableView framework for RTA projects.
It contains classes, extensions, helpers and many more files developed and maintained by RTA developers.
Main purpose of this framework is to gather common codes used in RTA projects in one comprehensive framework
to facilitate developing and maintaining new and old projects in the fastest, safest and simplest way possible.
